p: Recently, Rolta et al. (2020) reported molecular docking studies of 100 major phytocompounds of ten selected medicinal plants ( Rheum emodi, Thymus serpyllum, Cymbopogon citratus, Moringa oleifera, Thalictrum foliolosum, Berberis aristata, Piper nigrum, Allium sativum, Myristica fragrans and Zanthoxylum armatum) for interaction with RNA binding domain (N-terminal Domain/ NTD; PDB 6VYO) of nucleocapsid phosphoprotein of SARS-CoV-2. The molecular docking study revealed that five phytocompounds namely emodin, anthrarufin, alizarine, aloe- emodin and dantron of Rheum emodi showed effective binding affinity and pharmacokinetic properties with NTD of RNA binding domain of nucleocapsid phosphoprotein of SARS- CoV-2 ( Rolta et al., 2020).
